mapper.select: SELECT D.DNUM AS dnum ,D.GNUM AS gnum ,TO_CHAR(D.DDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ddate ,D.DPERSON AS dperson ,D.DMENU AS dmenu ,D.DTYPE AS dtype ,D.DASK AS dask ,D.DCHECK AS dcheck ,D.DTIME AS dtime ,D.DCOUNT AS dcount ,D.DLIMIT AS dlimit ,S.SNAME AS sname ,S.SNUM AS snum ,S.SIMAGE AS simage ,S.SADDRESS AS saddress ,S.SDETAILADDR AS sdetailaddr FROM DETAILS D INNER JOIN GRADES G ON D.GNUM = G.GNUM INNER JOIN STORES S ON G.SNUM = S.SNUM WHERE G.MID = #{mid} AND D.DCHECK = 'Y' ORDER BY D.DDATE DESC

SELECT S.SNUM AS snum ,S.SNAME AS sname ,S.SIMAGE AS simage ,S.SADDRESS AS saddress ,S.SDETAILADDR AS sdetailaddr ,T.GLEVEL AS glevel ,T.GLIKE AS glike FROM STORES S INNER JOIN ( SELECT G.GNUM AS gnum ,G.GLEVEL AS glevel ,G.GLIKE AS glike ,G.SNUM AS snum FROM DETAILS D INNER JOIN GRADES G ON D.GNUM = G.GNUM WHERE G.MID = #{mid} AND G.GCURRENT = 'Y' AND G.GLIKE = 1 AND D.DCHECK = 'Y' GROUP BY G.GNUM, G.SNUM, G.GLEVEL, G.GLIKE ) T ON S.SNUM = T.SNUM ORDER BY S.SNAME ASC
SELECT GNUM AS gnum ,MID AS mid ,SNUM AS snum ,GLEVEL AS glevel ,GCURRENT AS gcurrent ,GLIKE AS glike ,GCOUNT AS gcount FROM GRADES WHERE MID = #{mid}

SELECT G.MID AS mid ,D.DNUM AS dnum ,TO_CHAR(D.DDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ddate ,D.DTIME AS dtime ,D.DPERSON AS dperson ,D.DMENU AS dmenu ,S.SNUM AS snum ,S.SIMAGE AS simage ,S.SNAME AS sname FROM DETAILS D INNER JOIN GRADES G ON D.GNUM = G.GNUM INNER JOIN STORES S ON G.SNUM = S.SNUM WHERE G.MID = #{mid} AND D.DTYPE = 'Y' AND D.DCHECK = 'N' ORDER BY D.DDATE ASC
SELECT DNUM ,GNUM ,DDATE ,DPERSON ,DMENU ,DTYPE ,DASK ,DCHECK ,DTIME ,DCOUNT ,DLIMIT FROM DETAILS WHERE DDATE LIKE SYSDATE AND DNUM = #{dnum}
